DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy six-month-long intervention improve nutrition physical activity environment child care center serve racially ethnically diverse child birth two year age family home . The focus intervention center policy , provider parent practice , child 's home environment influence dietary intake physical activity . Outcomes study include child dietary intake , physical activity , two adiposity measure : weight-for-length skinfold thickness . Child care center child 's home environment also measure evaluate well support healthy behavior .
DOC.brief_title: Baby Nutrition Physical Activity Self-Assessment Child Care ( NAP SACC ) Intervention Study
DOC.criteria: license child care center North Carolina ( NC ) serve child birth 2 within 120 mile radius Duke University child must participate center 318 month age baseline read/speak English adult teacher infant/toddler classroom within participate center adult parent infant/toddlers within participate center child care center outside 120 mile radius Duke University child younger 3 month 18 month age parent child intend leave participate center < 12 month
